Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Shuttle buses have been requested between UIC/Halsted and Forest Park to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
